amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds by the Department of Veterans Affairs to implement policies that prohibit the Veterans Integrated Service Networks from conducting outreach or marketing to enroll new veterans in such Networks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2197 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2197 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14938) To prohibit the use of funds by the Department of Veterans Affairs to implement policies that prohibit the Veterans Integrated Service Networks from conducting outreach or marketing to enroll new veterans in such Networks.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2197 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2197 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
